mapper.sql: score_id, select_id, score, is_again, times_score, test_score
mapper.select:
select c.course_name as courseName, c.course_class as courseClass, c.course_credit as courseCredit, sc.times_score as timesScore, sc.test_score as testScore, sc.score as value, sc.score_id as scoreId, s.select_id as selectId, 'numberbox' as editor, p.public_value_name as "group"
from selectcourse s left join course c on c.course_id = s.select_courseid left join score sc on sc.select_id=s.select_id left join user u on u.id = s.select_studentid left join publicparam p on p.public_code='schoolYear' and p.public_value_id = s.select_year where u.id = ${studentId}

select c.course_name as courseName, c.course_class as courseClass, c.course_credit as courseCredit, sc.times_score as timesScore, sc.test_score as testScore, sc.score as score, sc.score_id as scoreId, s.select_id as selectId, 'numberbox' as editor, p.public_value_name as "group", o.name as "name", s.select_teacher as teacher
from selectcourse s left join course c on c.course_id = s.select_courseid left join score sc on sc.select_id=s.select_id left join user u on u.id = s.select_studentid left join publicparam p on p.public_code='schoolYear' and p.public_value_id = s.select_year left join organization o on o.id=c.organization_id where u.id = ${studentId}
mapper.insert:
insert into score
score_id,
select_id,
score,
is_again,
times_score,
test_score,
#{scoreId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{selectId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{score,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{isAgain,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{timesScore,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{testScore,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
mapper.update:
update score
select_id = #{selectId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
score = #{score,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
is_again = #{isAgain,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
times_score = #{timesScore,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
test_score = #{testScore,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where score_id = #{scoreId,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update score set select_id = #{selectId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, score = #{score,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, is_again = #{isAgain,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, times_score = #{timesScore,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, test_score = #{testScore,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where score_id = #{scoreId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
